definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
(to do sth) separately/as a separate action
another case (in law)/a case to treat separately
to take an alternate route (idiom)/to find an alternative/to take a different approach/to blaze a new trail
lit. to set up a separate kitchen (idiom); to start from scratch/back to square one/to start of on a new path
to treat differently/another cup of tea
to treat sb favorably/to view in a new light
to break up/to divide property and live apart/to start on a new (path)
Save As ... (menu option in a software application)
the Other List (Qing dynasty register of outlaws)/a blacklist of undesirables
please find sb better qualified than me (idiom)
to have an axe to grind (idiom)

sentences.chinese: “晚安”伊娃說，她搬起另一把椅子。

sentences.english: What the little boys didn't know was that a second train was heading straight for them.
sentences.chinese: 另一列火車正朝他們駛過來，兩個小男孩卻渾然不知。

sentences.english: Melva kisses another guy in front of her boyfriend justifying it to herself as an eye for an eye.
sentences.chinese: 梅爾瓦在男友面前親吻另一個男孩，自以爲報復。

sentences.english: Another example is the blood donation campaign.
sentences.chinese: 另一個例子是捐血戰役。

sentences.english: Well read it, and we'll talk about it some other time, eh.
sentences.chinese: 那好，拿去看吧。我們另找時間談，嗯？
用掉是另一個尷尬的用詞。

sentences.english: Afterwards, we go back in for another lesson until lunch at 12:00.
sentences.chinese: 之後，我們回教室上另一節課，至到12點喫午飯。

sentences.english: Azar, who learned the trick years ago from another clerk.
sentences.chinese: 他幾年前從另一個職員那學來了這一招。

sentences.english: Another Tozeuma shrimp is also found at Ninepin Group.
sentences.chinese: 另一款鋸片蝦也被發現於果洲羣島。

sentences.english: The other major trend of the past few years has been the move to multi-core chips.
sentences.chinese: 過去幾年的另一個主要趨勢是向多核芯片的過渡。

sentences.english: But what we apply that capability to is another question.
sentences.chinese: 但是我們把能力應用到什麼地方則是另一個問題了。

sentences.english: They are currently in the process of piloting two programs aimed at getting families outdoors.
sentences.chinese: 他們最近還在實施另兩個旨在讓家庭走向戶外的項目。

sentences.english: Another career path for teachers focuses on education administration.
sentences.chinese: 教師工作的另一個出路就是教育管理。

sentences.english: Heavy wind at the time was another factor.
sentences.chinese: 當時的風颳得很大是引起這樣大火勢的另一個因素。

sentences.english: In going from room to room in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 摸黑要走到另一個房間去。
弗洛依德的另一個故事。

definition: other/the others/else/other than it/in addition to the thing mentioned above
apart from this/in addition to this
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
